name: Annul
oracle_text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
flavor_text: The most effective way to destroy a spell is to ensure it was never cast in the first place.

name: Arc Lightning
oracle_text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor_text: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

name: Aura Fracture
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

name: Blastoderm
oracle_text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"I see more than others do because I know where to look."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Circle of Protection: Black
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Erase
flavor_text: Perception is more pleasing than truth.

name: Llanowar Elves
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Miscalculation
oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Priest of Titania
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G} for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Titania rewards all who honor the forest by making them a living part of it.

name: Saprazzan Skerry
oracle_text:
Saprazzan Skerry enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
{T}, Remove a depletion counter from Saprazzan Skerry: Add {U}{U}. If there are no depletion counters on Saprazzan Skerry, sacrifice it.

name: Seal of Cleansing
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

name: Seal of Removal
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold."
—Seal inscription
